com.application.components

Class TextAreaLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.server.AbstractClientConnector
      • com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
        • com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponentContainer
          • com.vaadin.ui.TabSheet
            • com.application.components.TextAreaLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.event.FieldEvents.BlurNotifier, com.vaadin.event.FieldEvents.FocusNotifier, com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.server.Sizeable, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.Component.Focusable, com.vaadin.ui.ComponentContainer, com.vaadin.ui.HasComponents, com.vaadin.ui.HasComponents.ComponentAttachDetachNotifier, com.vaadin.ui.SelectiveRenderer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<com.vaadin.ui.Component>

    public class TextAreaLayout
extends com.vaadin.ui.TabSheet
    Class that includes the text editor windows to allow updating files.

    This tab sheet includes automatically three tabs using a single textStruct, this makes to update the values each time a tab is changed, but the info is not replicated.

    Author:
    Miguel Urízar Salinas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addCustomTab

        private void addCustomTab(int typeTei,
                java.lang.String caption,
                java.lang.String description)
        Creates the layout of the tab.

        Not necessary to fill it because for that there is the Tab Change Listener.

        Parameters:
        typeTei - Defines which part of TEI file to show. Constants defined in TextEditor.
        caption - Used to name the tab and to know which tab is selected

      • updateTab

        private void updateTab(com.vaadin.ui.CssLayout tab)
        Method called from Tab Change Listener.

        Creates the sheet shape content of the tab, updating the type of content to show from TextEditor class

        Parameters:
        tab - Active tab to update
